editedFacts.appliances: Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range / Oven, Refrigerator
editedFacts.rooms: Breakfast nook, Dining room, Family room, Laundry room, Master bath, Pantry, Sun room, Walk-in closet

response.homeDescription: Welcome Home! This gorgeous property has high quality renovations you'll love! Nestled in a mature neighborhood with great school district. Enjoy stepping in and look at the gorgeous hardwood, travertine and ceramic tile flooring. Some of the amazing features of this home include a sunroom to die for! Plenty of space to entertain and enjoy with family and friends! This move in ready has: 2014 Energy Efficient Windows, Large HVAC, Granite in Kitchen & Hall bath, Double Porcelain Sink, Double Oven, Fresh Paint. Hall Bathroom Updated with granite, new sinks, fixtures elongated toilet, new fixtures, 2013 Master renovated, Ceramic Tile, new picture window, fixtures, Hardwoods & Travertine in Foyer, 2005 Roof, Gas Fire Place, Cabinets in Laundry. Storm doors, shutters, Heat Pump. Home has all new , gutters and downspouts (2014). Large living room with vaulted ceiling and gorgeous exposed beams to give a touch of character to your new home! Sunroom has a zone line heated and cooled separate unit. Faux Blinds, Dining Room & Foyer have crown molding & Chair Rail. Vinyl siding with 1/4 Brick water table base. Foyer has arched way in the family room and Dining room. The master Bedroom is very large with a spacious updated Master Bath. Master has 2 walk in closets. Outdoors has a 2 tier Deck with Stone Firepit, Wooden Privacy Fence with Double Gate. Large Covered Porch. Close to Riverton Middle and Mt. Carmel Elementary schools. Wait no longer, Come and see this home for yourself! Contact us for more information today. 256-797-2283 Remember, The Brooks Family Of Realtors Has Been Serving The North Alabama Families Since 1972.
response.whatOwnerLoves: The Renovations and the Large Entertaining space area will provide you and your family the home you were looking for! This is a Real Move in Ready immaculate HOME!.
